description:
Run automatic direct message function to new members
requires confirmation by reaction
Stop automatic direct message function to new members

change the message that will be sent to new members
requires confirmation by reaction
displays messages to be sent to new members

change bot status. 
list of status [online, offline, idle, dnd, invisible]

change bot activity. 
list of <activity> [playing, completing, custom, listening, streaming, unknown, watching]
